website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice, but The First Years model offers similar quality for a lower price.
pros: Unique drain plug changes color to indicate perfect water temperature
cons: Some consumers noted that it is a tight fit for larger children

customer_reviews.title: Shocking!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not taken a bath my entire life and my parents finally bought me this as a gift as i started to smell a little funky, my first time was scary but fun, a huge hand held me in place while another one washed my entire body... yeah even there. at first i was shocked, but as it went on it felt pretty good and i enjoyed finally getting clean and all that gunk off of me, looking forward to my next bath as i heard some rumors about yellow rubber duckies....
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love it! The biggest issue we had with some of the other competitors were all of the areas where bacteria can hide. This is just one solid piece of plastic in the shape of bath tub, making it quite easy to clean. The ergonomics of it are also ideal as it positions the baby not too upright, not too flat, but just right. If you're on the fence, I think it's safe to jump off. Hope this helps with your selection!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan U.

customer_reviews.title: On the Small Side
customer_reviews.text: This product is very light weight and easy to use, however it is way to small. My baby is only 6 months old and I was very disappointed to find that he is almost too long for it. His length is near the upper percentiles for his age, however this tub's specs specifically state that it is for up to 18 months. My son can not yet sit up on his own, and the only way he would fit in the tub was to remove the support, which causes him to awkwardly slide down. Had he fit properly in the tub, it would have been perfect, and my review would have been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, simple bath. Great price point!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, good size baby bath that I’m confident with grow with us past the newborn stage. I love that it’s long enough to turn my baby around for washing her back and i can be confident that I won’t bump her head off the edge. Very easy to clean, minimum fuss. (Note: I had Oreina Lou bought one of those lotus flower sink cushions for bathing my newborn - it was so large, so hard to soak in water, and then so heavy and clunky to squeeze out afterwards. This standard bath is much easier and makes less water mess)
customer_reviews.author: Oph

customer_reviews.title: The tub is cute and a great size. It looks great
customer_reviews.text: The tub is cute and a great size. It looks great. The changing color drain plug hasn't worked for us. We even used a thermometer to make sure we had a good temp, but it stayed grey. One other thing that would make this better, would be if it came with a hook to hang in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for sink bathing
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2, one for our house one for grandmas house. Our baby seems happy while bathing in it. We bought this one specifically because it fits inside our large kitchen sink. Our only complaint is that the blue plastic seat piece doesn't snap into place on one of the tubs, so we use that tub without the seat (works bc baby sits up on his own). Pros: not too $$$, small, simple design, easy to clean, doesn't get dingy, ergonomically correct for baby. Cons; seat doesn't always snap into place
customer_reviews.author: Megan D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby bath!
customer_reviews.text: My baby has loved this bathtub from day one. It kept him held up and safe when he was a newborn, and now that he's 9 months old he loves sitting up and splashing around in it! Has a drain with a silicone plug that holds in all the water really well. This tub should last you a good long while, just turn the infant seat part around when they get bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but missing piece!

customer_reviews.author: Erika B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathtub! The silicone butt portion helps baby stay in place and not slip around much while in the bath. I really enjoyed this product but then went on vacation and used a bathtub someone lent us that had just plastic where the butt bump is and this is so far superior. The only thing I wish is that the company was a little more descriptive about the little silicone flap that changes color when you fill the tub to tell consumers exactly what color it should be for optimal bath temp and perhaps even if it changed to another color if it was too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes Bathtime Less Stressful
customer_reviews.text: This tub is perfect! We transitioned from a sink insert to this for our now 6 month old. We tried another tub (the insert was a part of a set), but the baby slid around, the seat would come off-- it was a nightmare! His godmother had this one, and after seeing it in action, I knew it was the right tub for us! It fits easily inside our small second bathtub, and as he's gotten bigger, he loves sitting upright in the tub and splashing. And I love that the non-skid surface and raised seat keep him in place! We keep one at home and took one to his sitter's. I'll be recommending it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product

Great for infants who can hold their head up on their own and older. Or for smaller infants if you have a partner willing to help.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, versatile bathtub

We have been using this tub since our child was approx. 1 month old and it appears that it will likely work until she is at least 1.5 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and Poorly Designed!

When our son leaned forward he slipped out of position, fell forward and hit his head on the faucet. The support piece isn’t high enough to keep him in place. This thing is dangerous and poorly designed.
